title: Wrong labels in Update Test Suite dialog
description: The labels in the Update Test Suite dialog are incorrect.
EB: The label "Test Classes to be included" should be written with a space (Test Classes) instead of without a space (TestClasses). The status line incorrectly references methods being selected instead of types. The action name should be written as separate words (Test Suite) instead of being written together (TestSuite).
SR: The label "Test Classes to be included" should be changed to "Test Classes". The status line should be updated to reference types instead of methods. The action name should be updated from "TestSuite" to "Test Suite".
